events.message: I received my order yesterday but the item was not what I expected, and I want to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system classified the case as Refund based on the customer's message mentioning the desire to return and get money back.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah M. who specializes in handling refund requests and returns for faster resolution.
Hello! I'm Sarah, I'll be helping you with your refund request today. Could you please provide your order number for verification?
To proceed with your refund, I need a few details like the order ID, reason for refund, and whether the product has been opened or used.
Order number is 4587623. The product was not as described, and I have not opened the package at all as I want to return it.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated a refund process for your order. You will receive an email with return instructions shortly.
Thanks for handling this quickly. I appreciate the clear instructions and prompt response regarding my refund.
The refund case has been marked resolved after confirming the return instructions were sent and customer is satisfied with the support.
Just checking in to ensure you have received the refund and everything was processed smoothly. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since no further issues were reported, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for contacting support, have a great day!
